comment: Pretty easy class and nice, helpful professor. There were chapter quizzes (14, almost weekly), 7 short writing assignments (at least 1 page), a few longer writing assignments, and two exams (no webcam). Would recommend!

Prof. Jefferson is very hands-off. The Health class I took with her was great. It was all online and very independent and self-paced. Her instructions were very clear. I don't think I had to email her a single time with a question.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class
